com.xhive.versioning.interfaces
Interface XhiveBranchIf

public interface XhiveBranchIf

Represents a branch in the VersionSpace.

(c) X-Hive Corporation B.V. (www.x-hive.com)

Since:
X-Hive/DB 2.0

Method Summary
 void delete()
           Deletes all the versions that belong to this branch and its subbranches but not to topbranches.

           Get the document from the version that was last added to this branch.

Method Detail

delete

void delete()

Deletes all the versions that belong to this branch and its subbranches but not to topbranches.

getHeadDocument

XhiveDocumentIf getHeadDocument()

Get the document from the version that was last added to this branch.

Returns:
The document from the version that was last added to this branch.

getHeadLibraryChild

XhiveLibraryChildIf getHeadLibraryChild()
Get the library child from the version that was last added to this branch. This can be either a blob or a document.

Returns:
The library child from the version that was last added to this branch.

getId

java.lang.String getId()

Get the Id of this branch.

The Id of branches always have a uneven number of numbers. The first branch always has the Id 1.
The Id of other branches are created adding the first even number not taken by another branch to the Id of the version where this branch is created from. For example, version 1.6 already has a successor with Id 1.7, checking in a new version on version 1.6 creates a version with Id 1.6.2.1 and thus a branch with Id 1.6.2 has been created. Creating more branches from version 1.6 creates versions with id 1.6.4.1, 1.6.6.1 and thus branches with Id 1.6.4, 1.6.6 etc.

Returns:
The Id of this branch.

getVersionByDate

XhiveVersionIf getVersionByDate(java.util.Date date)

Get the version from this branch with date of storage that comes closest to date.

Parameters:
date - the date of the version.
Returns:
The version with date of storage that comes closest to date.

getVersions

java.util.Iterator<? extends XhiveVersionIf> getVersions()

Get the versions of this branch starting from the last stored version in this branch.

Returns:
Iterator containing all the version in this branch starting from the last stored version.
